summary: Allows the summoning of a horrible hellbeast, a cold killer... The unholy deadly chicken. This gallinaceous can kill those who attack it by convincing them mentally that they don\'t deserve to live.
descriptionHtml:
== Change Log ==

1.0 : added the spell.
1.1 : added appropriate sound on casting and a neat fire shader so that your foes know that it\'s not a regular pet.
1.2 : fixed the archive so that the script is correctly included. I even put the source file!

== Summary ==

Allows the summoning of a horrible hellbeast, a cold killer... The unholy deadly chicken. This gallinaceous can kill those who attack it by convincing them mentally that they don\'t deserve to live.

== Where can I get the spell ? ==
The book that teaches the spell can be bought randomly in spellsellers\' shops, and a copy is at the Sleeping Giant Inn, at Riverwood. It\'s an Expert Conjuration Spell, so you may not be able to cast it. 
[b]If you just want the spell without hassle or restrictions, open the console and type :
player.addspell 02001d8f[/b]


== Final note ==
It\'s a cheat mod, born from a joke with a friend, so don\'t expect too much from it. It was merely an excuse to learn Papyrus with a simple script. If I managed to make you laugh, my objective is complete. :)
I don\'t think I will update it, but if you have any idea to improve it, I would be glad to implement it!
author: Tidus2
